name: Overcharged Main Menu
description: Geometry Dash if it was a flashy mobile game.

rotate-buttons-logos.name: Rotate Buttons Logos
rotate-buttons-logos.description: Slightly rotate the logos of the bottom buttons.

desc-label-color.name: Main Buttons Description Color
desc-label-color.description: Change the color of the description text on the main buttons.

ltr-texts.name: Left-to-Right Button Texts
ltr-texts.description: Change the direction of the main buttons' title and description labels to left-to-right.

hide-bottom-buttons-texts.name: Hide Main Buttons Description Texts
hide-bottom-buttons-texts.description: Hide the static description texts of the main buttons.

goto-last-played-main.name: Go to Last Played Main Level
goto-last-played-main.description: Go to the last played main level when pressing the main levels button.

disable-creator-button.name: Disable CreatorLayer Button
disable-creator-button.description: Do not add the button for accessing CreatorLayer.

use-pusab.name: Use Pusab for Timer
use-pusab.description: Use the default Pusab font for the Daily and Weekly levels' timers.

alt-gddp-texture.name: Alternative GDDP Button Texture
alt-gddp-texture.description: Use the alternative GDDP button texture if you have GDDP Integration installed.

hide-main-levels-stats.name: Hide Main levels stats
hide-main-levels-stats.description: Hide the stats of the level on the main levels button.
